attributes.action: Exempt Property Workers and Delivery Drivers in London from Parking Fines
attributes.additional_details: London’s property and delivery sectors are essential, yet workers face challenges from limited parking. Property workers need access for viewings and maintenance, while delivery drivers keep goods moving. Parking fines create unfair burdens, harming productivity and efficiency. Exempting these workers, with safeguards like permits, will reduce stress and support these vital industries.
attributes.background: Exempt property workers, including estate agents, property consultants, finders, maintenance professionals, as well as delivery drivers, from parking fines when parked appropriately during work. Introduce a clear identification system, such as permits, to ensure responsible use of this exemption.
